explanation: [0-0] A man with short black hair and a thick beard sits at a desk wearing a black long-sleeved shirt, holding a computer screen in front of his face with both hands. There is a black keyboard on the white desk, and the background is an office environment with brown brick walls and glass windows, green plants by the wall, and gray office chairs. There is white text on the screen that reads "My boss THINKS I don't work".

[0-4] The man then holds the computer screen close to his face and wraps it around his head with silver duct tape, as a middle-aged man in a navy blue suit and a young man in a black suit watch. After taping the screen on, the man crosses his arms, leans back in his office chair, and rests his crossed feet on the desk. The man in the black suit smiles and nods after seeing this. He has short dark brown hair and a black beard. At this point, the white text on the screen disappears, and a large presentation screen can be seen in the background, along with many tables and chairs.

[4-14] Subsequently, all three men tape computer screens to their heads and walk forward in a line. Next, the three stand back-to-back, and then one of the men, wearing gray pants and black shoes, squats down and points forward with both index fingers, while the other two men remain standing. Afterwards, the three walk in a line towards a wall, and the man in front bumps into the wall and falls backward, bumping into the man in the middle, who in turn bumps into the man in the back, causing him to fall to the ground. There is a gray and green rectangular carpet on the brown wooden floor. There are also some off-white and green cabinets by the wall.

[14-23] Then a hand takes a pair of black virtual reality glasses out of a cardboard box. The glasses have the white letters "VISOR" on them. Then a man with a thick beard puts on the VR glasses and sits in a white office chair. Three different virtual screens surround the desk. The man uses both hands to zoom in on the middle screen, which is playing the movie Thor. Finally, the man's hands are operating a black keyboard, and the other two men are standing behind him, still with computer monitors strapped to their heads. The man on the left is holding a piece of wood in his right hand, and the man on the right rests his left hand on the left shoulder of the seated man, who opens his mouth wide and turns to look at him.
